channel.title: Computer Science on Thomas' net
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Science on Thomas' net

item.title: My Research Experience
item.description: My research journey started in May 2022. I joined the Song Lab at Wake Forest University School of Medicine as a high school intern and was fortunate to collaborate with Professor Song on two research projects. Excited by the application of neural networks in medicine and inspired by Prof. Songâ€™s previous work, I initiated two studies detailed below. I spent, on average, an hour every day during the school year and 8 hours a day during summer on research.
